error.message: Call to deprecated function db_select(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead, get a database connection injected into your service from the container and call select() on it. For example,
Call to deprecated function search_mark_for_reindex(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\search\SearchIndex::markForReindex() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to search_exclude.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
